hero.title: Turn Ideas into Cinematic Videos with Seedance 2.0
hero.description: Seedance 2.0 is a powerful AI video generator that brings your creative vision to life. From text prompts to image animation ‚Äî create professional-grade videos with fluid motion, realistic physics, and stunning visual effects. No editing experience needed.

showcase_grid.label: Powered by Seedance 2.0
showcase_grid.title: What Can Seedance 2.0 Create?
showcase_grid.description: From high-speed action to intimate character stories ‚Äî see what Seedance 2.0 AI video generation can do. Every frame below was generated by AI.

items.title: Fluid, Realistic Motion
items.description: Seedance 2.0 produces ultra-smooth motion synthesis that keeps every frame stable and artifact-free. Watch this high-speed racing sequence ‚Äî from tire spray to camera tracking, every detail flows with cinematic precision and physics-based realism.

items.title: Expressive Character Animation
items.description: Bring characters to life with Seedance 2.0's advanced motion engine. From subtle facial expressions to full-body gestures, AI-generated characters move naturally and expressively ‚Äî perfect for storytelling, brand videos, and creative projects.

items.title: Multi-Character Consistency
items.description: Seedance 2.0 locks facial features, clothing, and body proportions across every angle and scene. In this action-packed chase sequence, each character stays visually consistent ‚Äî ideal for ads, narrative content, and branded video series.

items.title: Image-to-Cinematic Video
items.description: Upload a single photo and watch Seedance 2.0 transform it into an immersive cinematic clip. Dynamic camera movement, professional pacing, and atmospheric effects turn static images into stunning motion content ‚Äî no editing required.

items.title: 3D Action & Visual Effects
items.description: Seedance 2.0 excels at generating complex 3D action sequences with cinematic camera work and fluid choreography. This movie-grade CG animation showcases physically accurate motion, dramatic lighting, and blockbuster-quality visual effects.

introduce.title: What is Seedance 2.0
introduce.label: About
introduce.description: Our platform provides a user-friendly interface for Seedance AI video generation. We offer access to advanced text-to-video and image-to-video capabilities through third-party AI models. This is an independent service, not affiliated with model providers.

items.title: Text-to-Video Generation
items.description: Describe any scene in natural language and let Seedance 2.0 generate a fully rendered video with characters, environments, and dynamic motion.

items.title: Image-to-Video Animation
items.description: Upload any photo ‚Äî a product shot, portrait, or landscape ‚Äî and Seedance 2.0 breathes life into it with intelligent motion and cinematic effects.

items.title: Physics-Based Rendering
items.description: Advanced simulation technology models realistic object interactions, lighting, and material behavior for believable, production-ready output.

items.title: Ultra-HD Output
items.description: Export your creations in 1080p Full HD with crystal-clear detail. No jitter, no artifacts ‚Äî just clean, professional video output.

benefits.title: Why Creators Choose Seedance 2.0
benefits.label: Benefits
benefits.description: Discover what makes Seedance 2.0 the go-to AI video tool for content creators, marketers, and filmmakers.

items.title: Cutting-Edge AI Models
items.description: Powered by state-of-the-art multimodal AI, Seedance 2.0 delivers breakthrough video generation with consistent quality across every generation.

items.title: Film-Grade Visual Quality
items.description: Every video looks like it came from a professional studio ‚Äî with cinematic color grading, stable motion, and detailed textures at up to 1080p resolution.

items.title: Multi-Shot Storytelling
items.description: Build complete narratives with multiple scenes, characters, and camera angles ‚Äî all maintaining visual consistency throughout.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Have more questions? Contact us for support.

items.question: What is Seedance 2.0?
items.answer: Our platform provides access to advanced AI video generation models through a user-friendly interface. We are an independent service, not affiliated with any AI model providers. This platform is a wrapper service that offers enhanced usability and additional features on top of underlying AI technologies.

items.question: What video resolutions does Seedance 2.0 support?
items.answer: Our platform currently supports up to 1080p Full HD output resolution. Output quality may vary based on the AI model used.

items.question: How long can Seedance 2.0 generated videos be?
items.answer: Generated videos are typically 5-10 seconds in length. Longer durations may be available depending on the model and your subscription plan.

items.question: What visual styles can Seedance 2.0 generate?
items.answer: Multiple visual styles are supported including realistic, anime, cyberpunk, watercolor, and more. You can specify your preferred style in the text prompt.

items.question: Can I animate existing images with Seedance 2.0?
items.answer: Yes! With image-to-video functionality, you can upload static images and transform them into dynamic videos. The AI adds realistic motion, camera movements, and scene animations while preserving the original image style.

items.question: What is the relationship between this platform and ByteDance?
items.answer: This platform is an independent service that provides a user-friendly interface for AI video generation. We are not affiliated with, endorsed by, or sponsored by ByteDance. We leverage AI models through API integrations to provide our video generation services.

cta.title: Ready to Create with Seedance 2.0?
cta.description: Join creators worldwide using Seedance 2.0 to turn imagination into cinematic video content. Start for free today.
